borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: T 1-5 rear garden; T6-7 front garden(T1) - Liquidamber -reduce crown by 25%(2m) to  suitable growth -reduce side growth to match, shape and balance -remove low inbound limb obstructing neighbours' side return back to main trunk collar(T2) - Sycamore (Acer pseudoplatanus) - self-set, grown too close to wall -fell to ground level -poison stump using EcoPlug capsules inserted into stump wood to prevent sucker regrowth(T3) - Cotoneaster var. -light reduction to tidy upper canopy line -light thin removing selected inner branches(T4) - Japanese Maple(Acer japonica) -reduce crown by 25% to suitable growth points -thin by 15% to allow more dappled light(T5) - Gingko (G.bilboa) -reduce height by 1.3m to suitable growth point -light trim side growth to match(T6) - Pittosporum - variegated -trim back height and sides to shape and tidy(T7) - Magnolia (M.soulangea) -reduce height by 1m -shape sides branches to balance and tidy
